item.title: MICCO GOLD
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: MICCO GOLD Capsule is a nutritional supplement. It is taken to treat conditions caused by deficiency of vitamins, minerals, and other nutrients in the body. It also ensures proper growth and functioning of the body. MICCO GOLD Capsule may be taken with or without food. Take it in the dose and duration advised by the doctor. To get the most benefit, take it regularly at the same time each day and continue taking it until your prescription is finished. Do not take it more than or longer than prescribed by the doctor, as that may cause harmful effects. It is generally safe medicine with little or no side effects. However, if you experience any symptom which you think is caused by the medicine, let your doctor know. They may be able to suggest ways to reduce or prevent the side effects. Before taking this medicine, it is important to let your doctor know if you have any preexisting medical conditions or if you are taking any other medications. This will ensure your safety to use this medicine. Pregnant and breastfeeding should consult their doctor before taking this medicine to make sure it is safe for them.
item.content:encoded:
Benefits

In Treatment of Nutritional deficiencies
MICCO GOLD Capsule contains nutritional supplements that help the body perform various vital functions like formation of red blood cells and absorption of iron in the body. It also helps your body use fats and carbohydrates for energy and make new protein. This combination contains other vitamins and minerals that help in strengthening the immune system, improve metabolism of the body and aid in the proper functioning of the nervous system. Taking MICCO GOLD Capsule improves general health and enhances the quality of life.

Side effects

Most side effects do not require any medical attention and disappear as your body adjusts to the medicine. Consult your doctor if they persist or if youâ€™re worried about them
Common side effects of MICCO GOLD
No common side effects seen

How to use

Take this medicine in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. MICCO GOLD Capsule may be taken with or without food, but it is better to take it at a fixed time.

item.title: RELYCONEX SG
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Lycopene, Vitamins & Minerals Capsules combination is a safe health supplement for those consumers who want to achieve good health. This combination provides antioxidant â€“ Lycopene, Vitamin C, Zinc, Vitamin E, Selenium with Vitamin A in specially formulated quantities, to bring the best supplement to fulfill the overall nutritional supplementation and provide health benefits. Dietary supplements are used by the majority of consumers because the todayâ€™s hectic life style and untimely food habits, it is not possible to take a balanced diet with recommended servings of fruits and vegetables i.e. do not get proper nutrition as a result they may become deficient of vitamins, minerals and other nutrients which may lead to deficiency and life style diseases. So people take supplements for all kind of reasons, usually relating to their health. This is a high â€“ potency multiple nutrients formula as the dietary supplements for all consumers. As nutrients in their proper amounts are required for optimum health and since our diets most likely cannot provide all of them, nutritional/health supplements can fill in these gaps. The functions of such nutrients are well known, and each of them plays one or more key roles in maintaining the daily functions basic to health and life itself. So this supplement is best for all consumers and should not be harmful for health. This combination consists of Lycopene with multivitamin and multimineral. It is a booster dose of antioxidants which protects body against physical stress and aids in proper functioning of human body. It contains a potent anti-oxidant Lycopene which helps body fight physical stress by scavenging free radicals that damage cellular function.
item.content:encoded:
Benefits

Antioxidant support to fight free radicals Improves peripheral blood circulation
Supports strong immunity system
Helps fight ageing
Promotes normal growth and development by increasing collagen formation
Supports the production of other proteins like enzymes, antibodies and hormones
Promotes bone health by increasing calcium absorption; prevents osteoporosis or weak bones by reducing bone loss
Helps convert fatty acids to energy, aiding in weight reduction
Promotes skin health through increased collagen formation

item.title: OXYGIN-40
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Benefits

Ginseng boosts the energy, lower blood sugar and cholesterol levels, reduce stress, promote relaxation. Ginkgo have anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, platelet-forming and circulation-boosting effects

Lycopene is a powerful antioxidant. It helps in preventing and slowing several types of cancer, protects eye and bones from oxidative stress, and also helps to lower blood pressure and treat coronary heart disease
Multi vitamins are required for the proper functioning and development of generalized needs like health of joints, nails, skin etc. They are helpful in weight loss, preventing chronic illnesses due to low vitamin levels, boosting immunity, improving joint health and much more

How to use

One capsule to taken once daily after meal with water. Use under medical supervision

item.title: NUTRIPLEX-SG
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: NUTRIPLEX SG Capsule contain essential multivitamins that are important for maintaining good health. It contains Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Cyanocobalamin, Niacinamide, Pyridoxine, D-Panthenol. Vitamin B complex is essential for metabolism of carbohydrates and amino acids. Enriched with Vitamin B12 (Cyanocobalamin), this medicine can be taken to treat or prevent vitamin deficiency due to poor diet, prolonged illness. NUTRIPLEX SG Capsule are used in treating megaloblastic anemia, Convalescence, adjuvant therapy with antibiotics, supportive therapy for cardiac & diabetic patients and post-operative recuperation. It also helps to boost your energy level and strengthen the immunity system. These Multivitamin & Multimineral Softgel Capsules are intended to treat or prevent vitamin insufficiency caused by a poor diet, certain diseases, or pregnancy. Vitamins and iron are crucial bodybuilding elements that help you stay healthy. Vitamins and minerals are essential for bone strength and skin health and radiance.
item.content:encoded:
Benefits

In Nutritional deficiencies NUTRIPLEX SG Capsule is a nutritional supplement that is used with other medicines in the treatment of many long term diseases. NUTRIPLEX SG Capsule is given as an injection by a doctor or nurse. It contains various vitamins that help in proper brain function, boosting body energy levels and are important for proper functioning of the nervous system. NUTRIPLEX SG Capsule also helps in the formation of red blood cells and enhances the absorption of iron in the body. It also helps in maintaining a healthy skin. Take it in the exact dose and duration as prescribed by your doctor for maximum benefits.
In Vitamin B12 deficiency
NUTRIPLEX SG Capsule is a nutritional supplement and helps to improve the level of vitamin B12 in your body. Vitamin B12 is essential in the formation of red blood cells and helps in absorption of iron in the body. As a result of this your haemoglobin level increases. This helps you overcome fatigue, weakness, pale skin, and shortness of breath. NUTRIPLEX SG Capsule also helps in strengthening the immune system, improves metabolism of the body, and is important for proper functioning of the nervous system.

Side effects

Most side effects do not require any medical attention and disappear as your body adjusts to the medicine. Consult your doctor if they persist or if youâ€™re worried about them Common side effects of Beplex Plus
Diarrhea
Tiredness
Headache
Nausea
Sleepiness
Upset stomach

item.title: DAILY MV
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: DAILY MV Softgel Cpsule is the mixture of Multivitamin, Multimineral & Antioxidant Softgel Capsules which are widely used for fulfilling the scarcity of nutrition in the body. Daily MV Softgel Capsule contains essential vitamins, minerals, and amino acids that work together to help build a stronger immune system, and also maintain heart health. The ingredients used in the formulation have antioxidant properties. Moreover, it helps maintain skin and eye health. It aids in the synthesis of blood cells that are produced and keeps one energised all day. The pill aids in the treatment of weariness and weakness. The use of these capsules aids in the prevention of nutritional deficits. These Multivitamin & Multimineral Softgel Capsules are intended to treat or prevent vitamin insufficiency caused by a poor diet, certain diseases, or pregnancy. Vitamins and iron are crucial bodybuilding elements that help you stay healthy. Vitamins and minerals are essential for bone strength and skin health and radiance. Antioxidants are found in various foods such as apples, aloe vera, and many others. Antioxidant softgel capsules lower the risk of a variety of ailments, including heart disease and some malignancies. Antioxidants scavenge free radicals from bodily cells and prevent or minimise oxidative damage.
item.content:encoded:
Benefits

It fills the deficiency of multivitamins. It is the best for heart health since it has antioxidants.
Effective for blood purification as it has multi-minerals.
Boosts the immunity and maintains overall health.

Side effects

Overdose of these capsules may cause some side effects like nausea, vomiting, diarrhea so take as the doctor prescribed. Otherwise, it does not cause any side effects since it is a nutritional supplement.

How to use

Multivitamin & Antioxidant Softgel Capsules can be taken with milk or water in a fixed time. It should be taken 3 times a day for better results and do not take this medicine if the doctor or dietician does not prescribe it. Taking it regularly at the same time enhances the effectiveness of these soft gel capsules to the body.

item.title: Ashwagandha Gummies
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Man Matters Ashwagandha Gummies are gluten-free and gelatin-free gummies formulated with KSM-66 ashwagandha, the purest and most potent form of ashwagandha. It aids in boosting immunity, strength, vigour, and mental well being. These gummies also contain vitamin D, which helps promote brain health, bone health and overall well-being. They also protect against common infections like cough and cold.
item.content:encoded:
Benefits

KSM-66 ashwagandha is a proven adaptogenic, i.e. it helps the body to adapt to stress
Boosts testosterone levels which improve muscle development and stress
The antioxidants found in ashwagandha, together with vitamin D, boost immunity and enhance brain function
Improves body’s ability to enter into deep rest, promoting sleep quality and improving body’s recovery

How to use

Have two gummies in a day, either early in the morning or between meals.

item.title: SEACAL 500-D3
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: SEACAL 500-D3/250IU Tablet is a nutritional supplement used in the treatment of calcium deficiency. It is prescribed when your diet alone cannot provide the necessary calcium your body needs. It increases the absorption of calcium and helps to prevent or treat low blood calcium levels. SEACAL 500-D3/250IU Tablet may be taken with or without food. Take it in the dose and duration advised by the doctor. Take it regularly at the same time each day to get maximum benefits from it. Do not take it more than or longer than prescribed by the doctor, as that may cause harmful effects. It may cause constipation and upset stomach in some people. If you experience any such symptoms on taking the medicine, let your doctor know. They may be able to suggest ways to reduce or prevent the side effects. Before taking the medicine, let your doctor know if you have any preexisting medical conditions or if you are taking any other medications. This will ensure your safety to use this medicine.
item.content:encoded:
Â 

Side effects

Most side effects do not require any medical attention and disappear as your body adjusts to the medicine. Consult your doctor if they persist or if youâ€™re worried about them Common side effects of Calcilac
Constipation
Upset stomach

Â 

How to use

Take this medicine in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Swallow it as a whole. Do not chew, crush or break it. SEACAL 500-D3/250IU Tablet may be taken with or without food, but it is better to take it at a fixed time.

item.title: FERIKING XT
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: FERIKING-XT Tablet has a combination of medicines which is used in the treatment of iron deficiency. It works by replenishing the iron stores in your body and corrects iron deficiency (anemia) by enhancing the absorption of iron in the body. It also helps in the formation of red blood cells. FERIKING-XT Tablet can be taken with or without food. Intake of dairy products with this medicine should be avoided. It should be used in the dose and duration as prescribed by your doctor. This medicine should not be consumed more than the recommended dose. This is usually a safe medicine with very minimal side effects. Some of the most common side effects of this medicine may be dark-colored stools or stomach upset. Contact your doctor immediately if you notice any symptoms of allergic reactions like swelling, itching, difficulty in breathing, hives, etc. Before taking this medicine, tell your doctor if you have any other health conditions. Inform your doctor if you are taking any other medicines or if you are pregnant or breastfeeding. It is advised not to consume alcohol after taking this medicine.
item.content:encoded:
Benefits

In Iron deficiency Iron deficiency is a condition in which your body lacks iron leading to a condition called anemia. This can result in symptoms that can affect your quality of life. These include shortness of breath, tiredness, reduced concentration, pale or yellow skin, brittle nails etc. FERIKING-XT Tablet helps treat as well as prevent iron deficiency by improving the level of iron in your body. It also reduces the risk of iron deficiency in pregnant and lactating women as well those who experience heavy menstrual periods. Along with taking FERIKING-XT Tablet, include iron rich foods like spinach, dates, organ meats like liver, iron fortified cereals etc.

Side effects

Most side effects do not require any medical attention and disappear as your body adjusts to the medicine. Consult your doctor if they persist or if youâ€™re worried about them
Common side effects of FERIKING-XT
Upset stomach
Dark colored stool

How to use

Take this medicine in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Swallow it as a whole. Do not chew, crush or break it. FERIKING-XT Tablet may be taken with or without food, but it is better to take it at a fixed time. Avoid FERIKING-XT Tablet with dairy products such as milk, cheese, curd, butter, paneer and ice cream.
